title: By Your Bootstraps: Porting Your Application to Python3
summary: This talk is an experience report / best practices summary, based on work porting a very large stack to Python 3.x. The stack includes the Zope3 component architecture, ZODB, WebOb, pyramid, other dependencies, totalling ~180 KLOC Python + ~25 KLOC C.
